text: Registration for most events is now CLOSED. Only Futsal and Cosplay registrations are still open!
Futsal and Cosplay registrations are still OPEN! Don't miss your chance to participate!
Ekarikthin 2026 is happening from 19th to 21st February at NIT Nagaland
Exciting prizes and competitions await! Check out the events page for details
All participants must carry their valid ID card and entry ticket for verification at the venue
Follow us on social media for live updates and behind-the-scenes content!
